toggle_bookmark.doc_string: Toggles the bookmarked state for each selection.

toggle_case_sensitive.doc_string: Toggles the Case sensitive flag in the Find/Replace/Incremental Find/Find in Files panel.

toggle_full_screen.doc_string: Toggles whether the current Sublime Text window is in full screen mode.

toggle_inline_diff.doc_string: Toggles whether the inline diff of the modifications under the cursor is displayed.

args.name: prefer_hide
args.doc_string: Whether to hide the other visible diffs, while showing the one(s) under the cursor(s).

toggle_menu.doc_string: Toggles the visibility of the menu bar.

toggle_minimap.doc_string: Toggles the visibility of the minimap.

toggle_overwrite.doc_string: Toggles whether the caret is in insert mode or overwrite mode.

toggle_preserve_case.doc_string: Toggles the Preserve case flag in the Replace panel.

toggle_record_macro.doc_string: Start or stop to record a macro.

toggle_regex.doc_string: Toggles the Regular expression flag in the Find/Replace/Incremental Find/Find in Files panel.

toggle_save_all_on_build.doc_string: Enable/Disable saving all open files before running a build command.

toggle_show_open_files.doc_string: Toggles the visibility of the list of open files in the sidebar.

toggle_side_bar.doc_string: Toggles the visibility of the side bar.

toggle_status_bar.doc_string: Toggles the visibility of the status bar.

toggle_tabs.doc_string: Toggles the visibility of the tabs.

toggle_whole_word.doc_string: Toggles the Whole word flag in the Find/Replace/Incremental Find/Find in Files panel.

toggle_wrap.doc_string: Toggles the wrap flag in Find/Replace/Incremental Find panel.

trim_trailing_white_space.doc_string: Delete trailing whitespace from all lines.

toggle_in_selection.doc_string: Toggles the In selection flag in the Find/Replace/Incremental Find panel.

toggle_highlight.doc_string: Toggles the Highlight matches flag in the Find/Replace/Incremental Find panel.

toggle_show_context.doc_string: Toggles the Show Context flag in the Find in Files panel.

toggle_use_buffer.doc_string: Toggles the Use Buffer flag in the Find in Files panel.

toggle_use_gitignore.doc_string: Toggles the Use gitignore flag in the Find in Files panel.

toggle_comment.doc_string: Toggles the comment for the particular scope based on the metadata file.

args.name: block
args.doc_string: Whether the comment to be toggled should be a block comment.

title_case.doc_string: Converts the selection(s) to title case.
